name: 柯萊恩
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
實驗研究
量調查研究或質調查研究
個案研究
回溯研究
文化比較研究
理論闡述研究
schedule:
First one-fourth:  Keep reading primary and secondary source materials, keeping a journal of your insights.
At this point it will be useful to look over this journal in its entirety and compose a narrative of your exploration.  What methodologies have you employed.  How has your topic been shaped or reshaped by the very act of doing research and writing about it?  What have you discovered that is surprising to you?  Have you found any differences of opinion among critics, or ideas brought forth by a given critic with which you disagree?  Are there certain dominant critical ideas used in writing about your primary source?  How might you characterize them, broadly speaking?

Second one-fourth:  Articulate what kind of approach or blend of approaches which suggest themselves to you to discuss your source (e.g., post-structuralist, Freudian, Jungian, anthropological, feminist, Marxist, phenomenological, philosophical, historical, etc.), and describe how this approach allows us a greater understanding of the source text, giving specific examples from your source text and keeping careful note of  (for example, if you have chosen to undertake a feminist reading of a novel) what other feminist scholars have also written about that novel.

Third one-fourth:  Combine what you have written over the first semester with what you have written over the second semester.  Prepare an abstract  Prepare final presentation.  DUE:  TEN TO FIFTEEN PAGES MINIMUM, INCLUDING ABSTRACT, ILLUSTRATIONS (IF ANY) AND WORKS CITED PAGE AT END. 

Final one-fourth:  Final editing details.  Rehearse oral presentation.  No power-point allowed. SECOND SEMESTER FINAL COPY DUE DECEMBER 26, 2011.
scorePolicy:
?	Timeliness in meeting benchmarks (see Course Schedule below); journal responses
?	Collaborating with senior project adviser to devise efficacious writing strategies
?	Originality
?	Care in choosing and utilizing sources
materials:
First one-fourth:  Keep reading primary and secondary source materials, keeping a journal of your insights.
At this point it will be useful to look over this journal in its entirety and compose a narrative of your exploration.  What methodologies have you employed.  How has your topic been shaped or reshaped by the very act of doing research and writing about it?  What have you discovered that is surprising to you?  Have you found any differences of opinion among critics, or ideas brought forth by a given critic with which you disagree?  Are there certain dominant critical ideas used in writing about your primary source?  How might you characterize them, broadly speaking?

Second one-fourth:  Articulate what kind of approach or blend of approaches which suggest themselves to you to discuss your source (e.g., post-structuralist, Freudian, Jungian, anthropological, feminist, Marxist, phenomenological, philosophical, historical, etc.), and describe how this approach allows us a greater understanding of the source text, giving specific examples from your source text and keeping careful note of  (for example, if you have chosen to undertake a feminist reading of a novel) what other feminist scholars have also written about that novel.

Third one-fourth:  Combine what you have written over the first semester with what you have written over the second semester.  Prepare an abstract  Prepare final presentation.  DUE:  TEN TO FIFTEEN PAGES MINIMUM, INCLUDING ABSTRACT, ILLUSTRATIONS (IF ANY) AND WORKS CITED PAGE AT END. 

Final one-fourth:  Final editing details.  Rehearse oral presentation.  No power-point allowed. SECOND SEMESTER FINAL COPY DUE DECEMBER 26, 2011.

name: 洪媽益
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
實驗研究
量調查研究或質調查研究
個案研究
回溯研究
文化比較研究
理論闡述研究
schedule:
Weeks 1-2 Writing Methodology
Weeks 3-4 Writing Results
Weeks 5-6 Writing Data Analysis and Discussions
Weeks 7-8 Writing Discussions
WEeks 10-11 Revisions
Weeks 12-13 Revisions
Weeks 14-15 Final Draft
Weeks 16-17 Preparing Powerpoint slides
Week 18 Oral presentation
scorePolicy:
Weekly meetings 40%
Final paper 30%
Powerpoint slides and presentation 30%
materials: Weissberg, Robert and Suzanne Buker. 2008. Writing up research: Experimental research report writing for students of English. Taipei: Pearson.

理論闡述研究
schedule:
01. 問卷調查設計定案
02. 問卷調查(a)
03. 問卷調查(b)
04. 問卷調查結果討論
05. 報告寫作：Intro.
06. 報告寫作：Lit Rev. (a)
07. 報告寫作：Lit Rev. (b)+ 研究問題定案
08. 報告寫作：問卷調查結果圖表製作
09. 報告寫作：調查結果分析討論
10. 英文修改第一遍
11. 英文修改第二遍
12. 英文修改第三遍
13. PPT 製作
14. PPT 英文修改第一遍
15. PPT 英文修改第二遍
16. PPT 英語演練第一遍
17. PPT 英語演練第二遍
18. 繳交書寫報告＋演示口頭報告
scorePolicy:
1. 報告之創意及內容紮實/可信度  50%
2. 英文寫作流利度               30%
3. 英語報告順暢度               20%
materials: 依據個人研究主題而定
